definition.text: Write a summary for this tutorial page.

paragraphs.text: We are almost there. Now click create user profile and watch the magic happen.  That’s right, you just created your profile!

While we didn’t have to break a sweat making your profile, some pretty amazing things happened behind the scenes. The constructor just generated your user profile, and unique SA Token Governance address. A cryptographic message with your GitHub.com username has been signed with the private key corresponding to the address just generated. This message will be stored in your User Profile so that we may authenticate it comes from you once you submit your profile as a plugin in the Governance Project.
What this means is that your profile, and its associated token address, can only be accessed and changed by you!
